name: Major Crimes Unit
description: A specialized division within the Gotham City Police Department focused on high-profile cases and organized crime.

content.title: History
content.body: The Major Crimes Unit was established as a part of the Gotham City Police Department to specifically address the growing wave of organized crime and high-profile criminal activities. Its creation was influenced by the increasing presence of costumed criminals and corruption within the city, requiring a dedicated team to handle these threats more effectively.

content.title: Geography
content.body: Located within the Gotham City Police Department headquarters, the Major Crimes Unit occupies a secure and strategic area of the building, complete with advanced technology and resources to tackle the demanding cases it handles.

content.title: Notable Features
content.body: The Unit is equipped with state-of-the-art forensic labs, interrogation rooms, and secured evidence lockers. It serves as a nerve center for coordinating complex investigations and operations against Gotham's most notorious criminals.

content.title: Story Significance
content.body: The Major Crimes Unit plays a pivotal role in 'The Dark Knight,' as it is involved in the investigation and pursuit of The Joker and the underworld crime lords of Gotham City. It becomes a key setting for detective work and the moral dilemmas faced by the characters involved, particularly highlighting the challenges faced by officers like James Gordon in balancing justice and the law.
